name: Banic 209
description:
Violet electricity crackles through the air as you grip the ancient artifact. Gazing down into the chasm below, you witness the flesh of the world pull away from the bone, revealing an eternity of darkness. Your fellow adventurers are inexorably pulled forward as one by one, they succumb to the great maw. 

The light of Liirra has long blessed this great city, but is this the moment it comes crashing down?

THIS GAME IS NOT REAL OR GOOD

CONTROLS:

Move: Left Analog

Jump/Double Jump: A or ✖

Shoot: RT or R1

Charge Shot: RB or R2

Option: Restart
